metadata.title: CVE-2018-6389 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description: In WordPress through 4.9.2, unauthenticated attackers can cause a denial ofservice (resource consumption) by using the large list of registered .jsfiles (from wp-includes/script-loader.php) to construct a series ofrequests to load every file many times.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
